channel.title: Familiar with WHMCS?
channel.description: I am trying to integrate WHMCS into my website completly and its a pain in the ass. I've gotten a little bit but now im trying to do a little bit of custom things like host gator has. is there anyone who knows a bit about it where they could give me some insight? I've tried googling but i get the same thing with every site i visit and its nothing new.

item.title: Familiar with WHMCS?

heed these words!
